title: Go Backstage at 2024 Jingle Ball Los Angeles With NCT Dream, Paris Hilton, Shaboozey, Flavor Flav & More
description: Check out these star-studded photos from this year’s Jingle Ball in Los Angeles.
author: Michael Calcagno
excerpt: Check out these star-studded photos from this year’s Jingle Ball in Los Angeles.
text: Check out these star-studded photos from this year's Jingle Ball in Los Angeles. Paris Hilton, Flavor Flav at iHeartRadio 102.7 KIIS FM's Jingle Ball 2024 at Intuit Dome on December 06, 2024 in Los Angeles, California. River Callaway ‘Tis Jingle Ball season! The 2024 iHeartRadio 102.7 KIIS FM’s Jingle Ball took over the Intuit Dome in Los Angeles on Dec. 1, with an impressive lineup of this year’s biggest hitmakers. SZA, Tate McRae, Meghan Trainor, Kane Brown, Benson Boone, Madison Beer, Shaboozey, T-Pain, Paris Hilton and NCT Dream all took the stage during the event, where they performed a set list of their best songs. In addition to the main event’s talent, there were also plenty of celebrity guests in attendance, including Flavor Flav, Kiss of Life, Addison Rae, McKenna Grace, as1one, Full Circle Boys and more. In addition to L.A., the Jingle Ball Tour hits Dallas, Chicago, Detroit, New York City, Boston, Philadelphia, Washington, D.C., Atlanta and Miami. See the full lineup list here. For those who were unable to catch the fun in person, the iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour will be part of an exclusive network special on ABC, airing Dec. 18 and available for streaming the next day on Hulu. In the meantime, check out the best onstage, backstage and red carpet photos from iHeartRadio 102.7 KIIS FM’s Jingle Ball below. html:
Check out these star-studded photos from this year's Jingle Ball in Los Angeles.

‘Tis Jingle Ball season! The 2024 iHeartRadio 102.7 KIIS FM’s Jingle Ball took over the Intuit Dome in Los Angeles on Dec. 1, with an impressive lineup of this year’s biggest hitmakers.

SZA, Tate McRae, Meghan Trainor, Kane Brown, Benson Boone, Madison Beer, Shaboozey, T-Pain, Paris Hilton and NCT Dream all took the stage during the event, where they performed a set list of their best songs.

In addition to the main event’s talent, there were also plenty of celebrity guests in attendance, including Flavor Flav, Kiss of Life, Addison Rae, McKenna Grace, as1one, Full Circle Boys and more.

In addition to L.A., the Jingle Ball Tour hits Dallas, Chicago, Detroit, New York City, Boston, Philadelphia, Washington, D.C., Atlanta and Miami. See the full lineup list here.

For those who were unable to catch the fun in person, the iHeartRadio Jingle Ball Tour will be part of an exclusive network special on ABC, airing Dec. 18 and available for streaming the next day on Hulu.

In the meantime, check out the best onstage, backstage and red carpet photos from iHeartRadio 102.7 KIIS FM’s Jingle Ball below.
